about_the_game:
This DLC Contains The Angel and the Imp Quest.
One day, an Imp and an Angel strolled into the Doodle God's office...
And caused quite a commotion
Give the Imp and the Angel various elements and see what happens.
detailed_description:
This DLC Contains The Angel and the Imp Quest.
One day, an Imp and an Angel strolled into the Doodle God's office...
And caused quite a commotion
Give the Imp and the Angel various elements and see what happens.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.0
  • Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7, 10.8, 10.9, 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
